mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE_CARTLIST(CART_ID, ID, P_ID, AMOUNT) VALUES (CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id} , #{p_id}, #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_ID, C.P_ID, C.ID, C.AMOUNT, P.P_NAME, P.PRICE, P.S_IMAGE, P.P_TYPE, P.STOCK FROM STORE_CARTLIST C, STORE_PRODUCTS P WHERE C.P_ID = P.P_ID AND ID = #{id}
